'''Tomaso Missaglias''' was a skilled armorer for hire from the city of [[Neverwinter]], active in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Tomaso hailed from a famous family of armorers. By the late 15{{th}}, he had embarked on a journey â€“ a family tradition, to learn armorer skills from foreign masters. Tomaso was a reluctant craftsman who trained in the craft only to satisfy his family. Eventually, he started offering his skills to the adventurers and defenders of Neverwinter.
